DOC.brief_summary: Interventional prospective randomize open blind end-point ( PROBE ) single-center clinical trial evaluation efficacy , safety , feasibility , reliability , cost-effectiveness in-ambulance telemedicine patient suspicion acute stroke .
DOC.brief_title: Prehospital Study Universitair Ziekenhuis Brussel II
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose PreSSUB II evaluate efficacy , safety , feasibility , reliability cost-effectiveness in-ambulance telemedicine Paramedic Intervention Team transportation patient suspicion acute stroke . The implementation expert stroke support pre-hospital arena use in-ambulance telemedicine innovative approach open new perspective allow continuous guidance stroke specialist throughout acute stroke care continuum .
DOC.criteria: Emergency transportation Paramedic Intervention Team Universitair Ziekenhuis Brussel Age > = 18 year Suspicion acute stroke symptom onset < 12 h unknown , base symptom mention Belgian manual medical regulation prehospital care : Hemiparesis , Facial asymmetry , Speech disturbance , Sudden , severe headache , Confusion . Patients inambulance telemedicine consultation would delay diagnostic therapeutic intervention .
